subtitle: Serve this fragrant roast chicken with couscous or Basmati rice.

method.text: In a bowl, mix together the ingredients for the herb and spice mixture. Set aside.
Weigh the chicken then place in an ovenproof dish. Cook in the oven for 25 min per 450 g then 25 min extra.
Halfway through cooking, spoon the herb and spice mixture over the chicken. Return to the oven until cooked.

To test whether thoroughly cooked, insert a skewer into the thickest part of the chicken leg and if the juices run clear it is cooked. If not, return to the oven until cooked. Transfer to a warmed serving plate.

title: Chicken Makalli
